title: Novel concepts for the diagnosis of fatty liver and personalized treatment

title_detail.value: Novel concepts for the diagnosis of fatty liver and personalized treatment

summary: Almost one in three adults suffer from non-alcoholic fatty liver. For the affected people this increases the risk of complications such as liver cancer, diabetes, high blood pressure and stroke.

summary_detail.value: Almost one in three adults suffer from non-alcoholic fatty liver. For the affected people this increases the risk of complications such as liver cancer, diabetes, high blood pressure and stroke.
